A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw this film three times\, trying to like it. I am a die hard star wars fan. grew up wanting to be Luke Skywalker. Rian Johnson has no respect for Star Wars or its lore. I didn't have any emotion. Walking out of the theater\, I realized I had never felt this way before. This movie had removed all of my emotions for Star Wars\, and I didn't care about anyone in this film. This is a disgrace to the great Star Wars saga.
